issue.title: mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue has been escalated to [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra):
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/issues/375

Please wait until it is solved there.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, you’re probably already using AdGuard Extra so you just need to wait until it is updated.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: Dakar Desert Rally (Windows app; the report form didn't accept "Dakar2Game.exe" as a URL)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

Unclear; we can assume the `2022-11-14T00:03:01.988Z` list version

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

"Dakar Desert Rally" on Steam/EGS, most visibly at the startlines of stages.

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I received an interesting heads-up from [an owner of *Dakar Desert Rally* on PCGamingWiki](https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Topic:X6von2hsqay3oswt), who claimed to have encountered ads in hub areas and startlines, but who allegedly found a way to block them. The supposed info was interesting enough that I'm forwarding it near-verbatim without actually having tested it myself.

The entries they suggested were:
```
||anzusafeframe.azureedge.net^
||assets.anzuinfra.com^
||caps-server.anzu.io^
||emqx.anzuinfra.com^
||events.anzuinfra.com^
||l1-1.anzu.io^
||logic.anzuinfra.com^
||mgw-2.anzuinfra.com^
```

Other than this, the provided details were somewhat sparse, including if they used any other entries/filters for anything.

3. Screenshots

comment.body:
The problem is that without scriptlets/JavaScript rules (advanced protection is required for those kind of rules) some popups cannot be blocked on iOS (the same in case of extension for Safari).
And even with advanced protection enabled, in some cases scripts are executed too late (on iOS/with Safari extension) and due to this some popups are not blocked, but fortunately not in this particular case.

pull_request.title: Update css_extended.txt
pull_request.body:
Removed Line 21: flashback.org#?#.dropdown-toggle:has(> span > i.fa)

This lines removes the button for a drop down menu located in the top right corner of the forum www.flashback.org. This menu needs to be accessible to sign a user in/out, control user settings etc.

# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [ ] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

Example: <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/100000>

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/134187#issue-1437022525 - To block this popup, "advanced" rules are required and Content Blocker doesn't support them. You can install AdGuard for Android - https://adguard.com/adguard-android/overview.html it hides this popup.

<hr>

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/134187#issuecomment-1306180988 - Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce it.
Please try to disable, then enable all content blockers in Safari's settings, update filters (wait until filters will be updated), restart web browser and check again if this sponsored posts are still visible.

issue.title: Fix regex for uBO (addresses https://github.com/DandelionSprout/adfil…

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

comment.body:
> So move to https://github.com/AdguardTeam/FiltersCompiler ?

I think this issue is related to the uBlock parser:
https://github.com/gorhill/uBlock/blob/master/src/js/static-filtering-parser.js#L26

I guess uBO also uses lists that don't go through the AG's Filters Compiler, and those lists can easily use `-]` in regexps.

comment.body: I think that this issue can also occur in the case of many filter lists, since `-]` is a valid regex, so this PR does not solve the problem itself. Maybe a better solution would be to replace `-]` with `\-]` internally before the regexp is passed to the [analyzer](https://github.com/foo123/RegexAnalyzer/blob/master/src/js/Regex.js).

comment.body:
@Alex-302 @AdamWr 

I'm getting hit by this. The original issue submitter seems that he didn't communicate in English. Well, in Chinese, `广告`=`advertisement` and `推广`=`promotion`. So basically in the included screenshots, those ads with similar design as the videos are the ones with `广告` and `创作推广` prepended in front of the "video titles". I can confirm the ones in the screenshots and what I can reproduce now are actual ads, by their Chinese titles.

For example, in OP's latest reply:

> ![Screenshot 2](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/241e5dfbacf22055fbfbe31483e01a910a1b015f351dc4cf1a75c80a0cd23231/68747470733a2f2f7265706f7274732d696d672e616467756172642e636f6d2f6951324a44364f2e706e67)

This means:

> [Advertisement] Zero prerequisite video editing course to help you with part-time job.
> SiXian education

issue.title: Fix regex for uBO (addresses https://github.com/DandelionSprout/adfil…

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

comment.body:
By the way, here is the problematic part in the analyzer library:

https://github.com/foo123/RegexAnalyzer/blob/807f106914ed8b650d792d7a158f63040fd579c3/src/js/Regex.js#L1079-L1099

When line 1094 checks whether the currently iterated character is a hyphen, you need a lookahead in which you check whether the next character sequence is whitespaces + closing bracket.

But this seems like a rather outdated / low documented / low tested library, I think there are much more modern ones.

issue.title: Dakar Desert Rally (Windows app; the report form didn't accept "Dakar2Game.exe" as a URL)

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

Unclear; we can assume the `2022-11-14T00:03:01.988Z` list version

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

"Dakar Desert Rally" on Steam/EGS, most visibly at the startlines of stages.

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I received an interesting heads-up from [an owner of *Dakar Desert Rally* on PCGamingWiki](https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Topic:X6von2hsqay3oswt), who claimed to have encountered ads in hub areas and startlines, but who allegedly found a way to block them. The supposed info was interesting enough that I'm forwarding it near-verbatim without actually having tested it myself, for the purposes of e.g. AdGuard for Windows and AdGuard DNS Filter.

The entries they suggested were:
```
||anzusafeframe.azureedge.net^
||assets.anzuinfra.com^
||caps-server.anzu.io^
||emqx.anzuinfra.com^
||events.anzuinfra.com^
||l1-1.anzu.io^
||logic.anzuinfra.com^
||mgw-2.anzuinfra.com^
```

Other than this, the provided details were somewhat sparse, including if they used any other entries/filters for anything.

3. Screenshots

They had not posted any screenshots at the time of writing.


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Looks like `anzu.io` can be blocked due to they provide ad solutions - added to our filters.
I'm not sure about other domains.
@DandelionSprout I don't have this game. Please specify screenshots with the ads and the list above.
So, what is needed:
1. Update filters in 1-2 hours.
2. Check the game.
3. If you still see ads, let me know which other requests need to be blocked (all or just some from the list below).
```
||anzusafeframe.azureedge.net^
||assets.anzuinfra.com^
||emqx.anzuinfra.com^
||events.anzuinfra.com^
||logic.anzuinfra.com^
||mgw-2.anzuinfra.com^
```

pull_request.title: auction.co.kr - Social Tracker Copyright-notice maintenance
pull_request.body:
## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [X] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [X] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [X] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [X] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [X] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [X] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [x] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [X] Filters maintenance.

### Enter the issue address

issue.title: Dakar Desert Rally (Windows app; the report form didn't accept "Dakar2Game.exe" as a URL)

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

Unclear; we can assume the `2022-11-14T00:03:01.988Z` list version

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

"Dakar Desert Rally" on Steam/EGS, most visibly at the startlines of stages.

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I received an interesting heads-up from [an owner of *Dakar Desert Rally* on PCGamingWiki](https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Topic:X6von2hsqay3oswt), who claimed to have encountered ads in hub areas and startlines, but who allegedly found a way to block them. The supposed info was interesting enough that I'm forwarding it near-verbatim without actually having tested it myself, for the purposes of e.g. AdGuard for Windows and AdGuard DNS Filter.

The entries they suggested were:
```
||anzusafeframe.azureedge.net^
||assets.anzuinfra.com^
||caps-server.anzu.io^
||emqx.anzuinfra.com^
||events.anzuinfra.com^
||l1-1.anzu.io^
||logic.anzuinfra.com^
||mgw-2.anzuinfra.com^
```

Other than this, the provided details were somewhat sparse, including if they used any other entries/filters for anything.

3. Screenshots

They had not posted any screenshots at the time of writing.


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Dakar Desert Rally (Windows app; the report form didn't accept "Dakar2Game.exe" as a URL)

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

Unclear; we can assume the `2022-11-14T00:03:01.988Z` list version

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

"Dakar Desert Rally" on Steam/EGS, most visibly at the startlines of stages.

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I received an interesting heads-up from [an owner of *Dakar Desert Rally* on PCGamingWiki](https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Topic:X6von2hsqay3oswt), who claimed to have encountered ads in hub areas and startlines, but who allegedly found a way to block them. The supposed info was interesting enough that I'm forwarding it near-verbatim without actually having tested it myself, for the purposes of e.g. AdGuard for Windows and AdGuard DNS Filter.

The entries they suggested were:
```
||anzusafeframe.azureedge.net^
||assets.anzuinfra.com^
||caps-server.anzu.io^
||emqx.anzuinfra.com^
||events.anzuinfra.com^
||l1-1.anzu.io^
||logic.anzuinfra.com^
||mgw-2.anzuinfra.com^
```

Other than this, the provided details were somewhat sparse, including if they used any other entries/filters for anything.

3. Screenshots

They had not posted any screenshots at the time of writing.


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
I saw that and thought you can contact with him.
However, it will be better if the original reporter can write about it here.

In fact, the `.layer_dark_popup.plotting_popup.login_proposal.plotting_mini.for_login` means a suggestion that requests a visitor that the visitor login to JoongAng website for unblocking some features without a subscription.
And, others request a visitor that the visitor subscribe a subscription of JoongAng.
